title: Dzula ya virusi vya korona
allTitles: {"dig":"Dzula ya virusi vya korona","en":"About Coronavirus","es":"Sobre el Coronavirus"}
credits: Created by Weiman Kow, instagram: weimankow
summary: This book gives basic advice on dealing with the coronavirus COVID 19

13.dig: Kuna chitu chimwenga ufwaacho kumanya dzulu ya virusi vya korona.
13.en: There's only ONE thing ﻿you need to understand about how a coronavirus

14.dig: Kuna chitu chimwenga ufwaacho kumanya dzulu ya virusi vya korona.
14.en: There's only ONE thing ﻿you need to understand about how a coronavirus

25.dig: Mutu asiye na virusi vya korona.

26.dig: Mutu asiye na virusi vya korona.

29.dig: Virusi nkuenea napho vidzitoni vya mahe.

30.dig: Virusi nkuenea napho vidzitoni vya mahe.

31.dig: Dzivwehe kanda.Kala mita 2 kure kpwa usifikirwe na vidzitoni.
31.en: Keep your distance.﻿2m will keep you safe from large droplets.

32.dig: Dzivwehe kanda.Kala mita 2 kure kpwa usifikirwe na vidzitoni.
32.en: Keep your distance.﻿2m will keep you safe from large droplets.

39.dig: Uchiona mutu  anakolola/anapiga myasa, unaweza kutsambula ku:
39.en: So if you see someone who is visibly coughing/sneezing/sick you can choose to:

40.dig: Uchiona mutu  anakolola/anapiga myasa, unaweza kutsambula ku:
40.en: So if you see someone who is visibly coughing/sneezing/sick you can choose to:

41.dig: Mphe maski kpwa achikolola ama achipiga myasa asiambukize ayae.
41.en: Give them a mask.﻿They can cough or sneeze in it and protects everyone else nearby.

42.dig: Mphe maski kpwa achikolola ama achipiga myasa asiambukize ayae.
42.en: Give them a mask.﻿They can cough or sneeze in it and protects everyone else nearby.

49.en: Maybe she's not sick, just protecting herself

50.en: Maybe she's not sick, just protecting herself

51.dig: Atu anjina ni akongo na taonyesa dalili za korona ele anaweza kuambukiza.
51.en: People who are infected can show no symptoms, but are still﻿infectious

52.dig: Atu anjina ni akongo na taonyesa dalili za korona ele anaweza kuambukiza.
52.en: People who are infected can show no symptoms, but are still﻿infectious

53.dig: Usikale phatu phenye atu anji kpwa kumanya niani ariye mkpwongo.
53.en: And in general, it's a good idea to avoid crowds, because you don't know who might be sick.

54.dig: Usikale phatu phenye atu anji kpwa kumanya niani ariye mkpwongo.
54.en: And in general, it's a good idea to avoid crowds, because you don't know who might be sick.

69.en: & even on the outside of your face mask

70.en: & even on the outside of your face mask

71.dig: Vyuma vya kugbwira  napho unapanda ngazi za gorofa.

72.dig: Vyuma vya kugbwira  napho unapanda ngazi za gorofa.

81.dig: Marazanjina mahe ga mutu mkpwongo nkuguta kpwatu kpwanjina…
81.en: However, sometimes a sick person's saliva can get on other things…

82.dig: Marazanjina mahe ga mutu mkpwongo nkuguta kpwatu kpwanjina…
82.en: However, sometimes a sick person's saliva can get on other things…

89.dig: Uchiguta vitu hivyo bila kumanya alafu ugute uso,
89.en: And if you do touch any of these things by accident, and then touch your face,

90.dig: Uchiguta vitu hivyo bila kumanya alafu ugute uso,
90.en: And if you do touch any of these things by accident, and then touch your face,

91.dig: Njira nono ya kuolaga virusi vino ni kutsukutsa mikono,na sabuni,jiki au spriti.
91.en: and the only effective way to get rid of them is to wash them off with soap, bleach, or alcohol.

92.dig: Njira nono ya kuolaga virusi vino ni kutsukutsa mikono,na sabuni,jiki au spriti.
92.en: and the only effective way to get rid of them is to wash them off with soap, bleach, or alcohol.

93.dig: Virusi vina weza kukala hai kpwa masaa.
93.en: Viruses can last for quite a few hours on objects,

94.dig: Virusi vina weza kukala hai kpwa masaa.
94.en: Viruses can last for quite a few hours on objects,

99.dig: Ndiyo mana nvinono kulunga mambo gano.
99.en: Which is why it is also good to follow these

100.dig: Ndiyo mana nvinono kulunga mambo gano.
100.en: Which is why it is also good to follow these

101.en: wash with soap up to here

102.en: wash with soap up to here

107.dig: Usidzigute uso wala usigute wa myao,napho nlazima ugute uso phanhi tsukutsa mikono vinono.
107.en: Do not touch your face. (Or anyone else's face.) If you have to, wash your hands with soap thoroughly first.

108.dig: Usidzigute uso wala usigute wa myao,napho nlazima ugute uso phanhi tsukutsa mikono vinono.
108.en: Do not touch your face. (Or anyone else's face.) If you have to, wash your hands with soap thoroughly first.

109.dig: muda wakutosha kuimba fungu ra kpwandza ra wira wa taifa.
109.en: Enough time to sing “Happy Birthday” twice

110.dig: muda wakutosha kuimba fungu ra kpwandza ra wira wa taifa.
110.en: Enough time to sing “Happy Birthday” twice

117.en: wash the back of your hands

118.en: wash the back of your hands

121.dig: Napho ukaiguta usikale na wasiwasi, tsukutsa mikono na sabuni
121.en: If you did, don't worry. Just wash your hands with soap after.

122.dig: Napho ukaiguta usikale na wasiwasi, tsukutsa mikono na sabuni
122.en: If you did, don't worry. Just wash your hands with soap after.

123.en: Also, don't touch the outside of the mask if you can.

124.en: Also, don't touch the outside of the mask if you can.

127.dig: Maski nkuhenda vidudu napho ichivwalwa sana.
127.en: *Bacteria grows on the insides of your mask if you wear them too long

128.dig: Maski nkuhenda vidudu napho ichivwalwa sana.
128.en: *Bacteria grows on the insides of your mask if you wear them too long

129.dig: Tsupha maski napho ina mahemahe ama ikakala chafu, usivwale maski kutsupa siku mwenga.
129.en: Throw away masks once they feel gross. Don't wear them for more than a day!

130.dig: Tsupha maski napho ina mahemahe ama ikakala chafu, usivwale maski kutsupa siku mwenga.
130.en: Throw away masks once they feel gross. Don't wear them for more than a day!

141.dig: Msirye chakurya sahani mwenga, msihumire tauli mwenga.
141.en: Do not share food, utensils, cups, towels.

142.dig: Msirye chakurya sahani mwenga, msihumire tauli mwenga.
142.en: Do not share food, utensils, cups, towels.

143.dig: Kpwa kuweza kuguta uso na chisukusuku ata uchijeza.
143.en: You can't touch your face with your elbow even if you tried

144.dig: Kpwa kuweza kuguta uso na chisukusuku ata uchijeza.
144.en: You can't touch your face with your elbow even if you tried

145.dig: Humira chisukusuku ama bega kuvugula miryango.
145.en: Open & close doors with your elbows or shoulders instead of hands, if possible.

146.dig: Humira chisukusuku ama bega kuvugula miryango.
146.en: Open & close doors with your elbows or shoulders instead of hands, if possible.

149.en: and after being out in the public

150.en: and after being out in the public

154.en: Always wash your hands with soap…
